messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Odd things we say to our kids
messages.msgSnippet: Thou shalt not lick raw poultry just cracks me up! Several years ago a friend of mine and I started a list of the odd things we say to our kids and the odd
messages.messageBody:
"Thou shalt not lick raw poultry" just cracks me up!

Several years ago a friend of mine and I started a
list of the odd things we say to our kids and the odd
things our kids say. We had lots of "everyday
oddness": things like "You shouldn't stand on your
sister". But some of my favorites were "We don't shave
the cats" and my friend's daughter singing "Let's Go
Fly A Kite" from Mary Poppins. The actual words are
"Up to the atmosphere, up where the air is clear", but
she was singing "Up to fly up yours, let's go fly up
yours". LOL

With kids around who needs television! Kids are so
much more entertaining!

Jessica

Mom to Cameron (1997) and Catherine (2004)

Come check out my art blog!
http://dancingdovecreations.blogspot.com/
